resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item:
"The following statistics are now available in the app:

• 7-day hospitalization incidence
• COVID-19 patients in intensive care units"
"The settings for notifications are now managed centrally in your smartphone settings. Check your notification settings for the Corona-Warn-App again in your device settings."
"You now have direct access to the universal QR code scanner in the lower navigation bar."
"After a restart, the app checks whether administrator authorizations (also known as root authorizations) are active on your smartphone and displays a security note if applicable."
